page.description: Determines whether or not the List control contains a defined value.
page.discussion: Returns true/false depending on whether or not *[js:value]* is contained in the List. The 'return value' column in the List is searched for a match. For example, if the List is configured to return the primary key, then the List is searched to see if any row in the list has a primary key that matches *[js:value]*.
